content:
# The stone furnace is still working and has successfully smelted 3 iron plates from the iron ore. It currently has 5 iron ore remaining and 4 coal left for fuel.
# 
# To maximize efficiency, I should extract the iron plates from the furnace and continue the smelting process. I will extract the 3 iron plates produced so far.

extract_item(Prototype.IronPlate, target=stone_furnace.position, quantity=3)  # Extracting the 3 iron plates from the stone furnace.
print(f"Inventory changed to {inspect_inventory()}")
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")
